Package layers

Class Node

java.lang.Object
layers.Node
public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the node generated for the layers within the neural network.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Node​(float weight)
    This constructor instantiates the node to the weight provided.
